dimensions: Warp x Weft: 91.4 x 21.6 cm (36 x 8 1/2 in.)
title: Fragment
provenance: ex-collection: Brummer. Sold in 1949: Parke-Bernet, New York.
description: Yellow-green damask lattice of circles connected by a bracket. Each circle contains a flowering plant within a foliate wreath with a circle with octagonal points within a floral scroll wreath. Each concave diamond has a medallion with leaves extended into the four points.
name: Fragment
